name: Ty Smith
overview:
Ty Smith lives in San Francisco. He is Sr. Software Engineer at Evernote on the Android product team and on the Developer Relations team. He contributes to the core Evernote Android application, maintains the [Evernote Android SDK](https://github.com/evernote/evernote-sdk-android), supports third party developers, judges hackathons, and evangelizes Evernote and the Evernote API.
He is also a co-founding member of [RECAPP](http://www.crunchbase.com/company/recapp). He architected the server app, API, and infrastructure. He also oversaw the creation of the mobile applications.
Previously he was Sr. Software Engineer (Android and Ruby) at [Onelouder Apps](http://onelouder.com/) and Sr. Software Engineer (Android and Ruby) at [Semaphore Mobile](http://semaphoremobile.com)
He received his B.S. in Software Engineering for the University of Texas.
Notable products:
[Evernote - Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.evernote&hl=en)
[Recapp - iOS/Ruby on Rails](http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/recapp-sports-news-app/id508110348)
[Powow Messenger - Android/Ruby on Rails](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.handmark.powow&hl=en)
[Zagat - Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.zagat&hl=en) - v 1.0 and 2.0 before the acquisition by Google.
